original_text: And the heart of Pharaoh was hardened, neither would he let the children of Israel go; as the Lord had spoken by Moses.
korean_text: 바로의 마음이 완악하여 이스라엘 자손을 내보내지 아니하였으니 여호와께서 모세에게 말씀하심과 같더라

sentences.original_text: And the heart of Pharaoh was hardened
neither would he let the children of Israel go
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘 자손을 가게 하지 않았으며

sentences.original_text: as the Lord had spoken by Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 모세를 통해 말씀하신 것과 같았더라
